print.disclamer-infor:
This calculator is designed to estimate the profit you may receive on your sharesave scheme at maturity, based on the information you input

The value of investments and the income from them may fall as well as rise and is not guaranteed. Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future results.

This tool is not advice and should not be used as the basis for making any decisions. Before you make any decisions, we strongly recommend you talk to a financial adviser.
print.disclamer-link:
For more information about this calculator, please refer to the important information and assumptions used.

Please select the button below to confirm you have read and understood these terms.
print.important:
Important information

This calculator is designed to estimate the profit you may receive on your sharesave scheme at maturity, based on the information you input.

The value of investments and the income from them may fall as well as rise and is not guaranteed. Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future results.

This tool is not advice and should not be used as the basis for making any decisions. Before you make any decisions, we strongly recommend you talk to a financial adviser.
